title: 234: Lord Jason Allan Scott- Part I
description: Lord Jason Allan Scott is an events expert and entrepreneurial consultant. He has hosted events from The Dark Knight, Mama Mia and Avatar. He is also possibly the REAL Most Interesting Man in the World! Sal, Adam & Justin interview Lord Jason about his escapades that could have been taken directly from the movies. Besides being a larger than life character, Lord Jason is a Mind Pump OG, MAPS follower and Mind Pump Private Facebook Forum member. This is episode 1 of 2. Please subscribe, rate and review this show! Learn more about Mind Pump at www.mindpumpradio.com
